description: Lentils help stretch the mince further without compromising flavour in this hearty, budget-friendly cottage pie recipe.
name: Beef & Lentil Cottage Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook under grill on middle oven shelf for 6 minutes or until crumb topping is toasted and golden. Serve.
